00014 void SGP_browseInput(   char*   fileName,
00015                                                 long*   nLines,
00016                                                 long*   n_gamma_parameter)
00017 {
00018         FILE*   inputFile;
00019         inputFile       =       fopen(  fileName, "r");
00020 
00021         if (inputFile == 0) return;
00022 
00023     char line[256];
00024 
00025     *nLines             =       -1;
00026     while(fgets(line, 256, inputFile))
00027     {
00028                 if(strstr(line, ":start spectrum:") != NULL)
00029                 {
00030                         while(strstr(line, ":stop spectrum:") == NULL)
00031                         {
00032                                 fgets(line, 256, inputFile);
00033                                 (*nLines)++;
00034                         }
00035                 }
00036 
00037                 if(strstr(line, "model") != NULL)
00038                 {
00039                         char    seps[]  = "=";                                                                  // delimiters can be ",", ";", or tab
00040                         char*   token;
00041 
00042                         token   =       strtok( line, seps );
00043 
00044                         token           =       strtok( NULL, seps );
00045                         long model      =       atol(token);
00046 
00047                         if(model == 1){
00048                                 *n_gamma_parameter = 2;
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051         }
00052         return;
00053 }

00056                                                 // return:
00057                                                 long*   nLines,
00058                                                 long*   n_gamma_parameter){
00059         SGP_browseInput(        *fileName,
00060                                                 // return:
00061                                                 nLines,
00062                                                 n_gamma_parameter);};

00064 void SGP_readInput(     char*   fileName,
00065                                         long*   nLines,
00066                                         long*   n_gamma_parameter,
00067                                         float*  E_MeV_u,
00068                                         long*   particle_no,
00069                                         float*  fluence_cm2,
00070                                         long*   slab_no,
00071                                         float*  parameter,
00072                                         long*   N2,
00073                                         char*   material_name,
00074                                         long*   n_slabs,
00075                                         long*   gamma_model,
00076                                         float*  gamma_parameter)
00077 {
00078         long    i;
00079 
00080         FILE*   inputFile;
00081         inputFile       =       fopen(  fileName, "r");
00082 
00083         if (inputFile == 0) return;
00084 
00085     char line[256];
00086 
00087     while(fgets(line, 256, inputFile))
00088     {
00089                 ////////////////////
00090                 // read in parameter
00091                 ////////////////////
00092                 if(strstr(line, ":start parameter:") != NULL){
00093                         while(strstr(line, ":stop parameter:") == NULL)
00094                         {
00095                                 fgets(line, 256, inputFile);
00096                                 // isolate value from name
00097                                 char    seps[]  = "=";                                                                  // delimiters can be ",", ";", or tab
00098                                 char*   token;
00099 
00100                                 token   =       strtok( line, seps );
00101 
00102                                 if(strstr(token, "r.min.m") != NULL){
00103                                         token                   =       strtok( NULL, seps );
00104                                         parameter[0]    =       (float)atof(token);
00105                                 }
00106 
00107                                 if(strstr(token, "N2") != NULL){
00108                                         token           =       strtok( NULL, seps );
00109                                         *N2                     =       atol(token);
00110                                 }
00111 
00112 
00113                                 if(strstr(token, "material.name") != NULL){
00114                                         token                   =       strtok( NULL, seps );
00115                                         char    tmp[256];
00116                                         strcpy(tmp, token);
00117 
00118                                         char    seps2[] = "\"";                                                                 // delimiter are now '"'
00119                                         char*   token2;
00120 
00121                                         token2                  =       strtok( tmp,  seps2);
00122                                         token2                  =       strtok( NULL, seps2);
00123                                         strcpy(material_name, token2);
00124                                 }
00125 
00126                         }
00127 
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 ////////////////////
00131                 // read in gamma
00132                 ////////////////////
00133                 if(strstr(line, ":start gamma:") != NULL){
00134                         while(strstr(line, ":stop gamma:") == NULL)
00135                         {
00136                                 fgets(line, 256, inputFile);
00137                                 // isolate value from name
00138                                 char    seps[]  = "=,";                                                                 // delimiters can be ",", ";", or tab
00139                                 char*   token;
00140 
00141                                 token   =       strtok( line, seps );
00142 
00143                                 if(strstr(token, "model") != NULL){
00144                                         token           =       strtok( NULL, seps );
00145                                         *gamma_model=   atol(token);
00146 
00147                                         if(*gamma_model == 1){  *n_gamma_parameter = 2;}
00148                                         if(*gamma_model == 2){  *n_gamma_parameter = 3;}
00149                                 }
00150 
00151                                 if(strstr(token, "parameter") != NULL){
00152                                         for (i = 0; i < *n_gamma_parameter; i++){
00153                                                 token                           =       strtok( NULL, seps );
00154                                                 gamma_parameter[i]      =       (float)atof(token);}
00155                                 }
00156 
00157                         }
00158 
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 ////////////////////
00162                 // read in spectrum
00163                 ////////////////////
00164                 if(strstr(line, ":start spectrum:") != NULL){
00165                         for (i = 0; i < *nLines; i++){
00166                                 fgets(line, 256, inputFile);
00167                                 // isolate energy, particle no., fluence, slab no.
00168                                 char    seps[]  = ",;\t";                                                                       // delimiters can be ",", ";", or tab
00169                                 char*   token;
00170 
00171                                 token = strtok( line, seps );
00172                                 E_MeV_u[i]              =       (float)atof(token);
00173 
00174                                 token = strtok( NULL, seps );
00175                                 particle_no[i]  =       atol(token);
00176 
00177                                 token = strtok( NULL, seps );
00178                                 fluence_cm2[i]  =       (float)atof(token);                                             // if < 0 --> D.set.Gy
00179 
00180                                 token = strtok( NULL, seps );
00181                                 slab_no[i]              =       atol(token);
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184 
00185     }
00186 
00187         //////////////////////
00188         // get number of slabs
00189         //////////////////////
00190 
00191         *n_slabs        =       1;
00192 
00193         for (i = 0; i < *nLines; i++){
00194                 *n_slabs        =       LMAX(*n_slabs, slab_no[i]);
00195         }
00196 
00197         return;
00198 }

00229 void SGP_browseSpectrum(        char*   fileName,
00230                                                         // return:
00231                                                         long*   nLines){
00232         *nLines = 0;
00233 
00234         FILE*   inputFile;
00235         inputFile       =       fopen(  fileName, "r");
00236 
00237         if (inputFile == 0) {
00238                 *nLines = -1;
00239                 return;
00240         }
00241 
00242     char line[256];
00243 
00244         while (fgets(line, 256, inputFile) != NULL){
00245                 *nLines         +=      1;}
00246 
00247         return;
00248 }

00250 void SGP_browseSpectrumS(       char**  fileName,
00251                                                         // return:
00252                                                         long*   nLines){
00253         SGP_browseSpectrum(     *fileName,
00254                                                 // return:
00255                                                 nLines);
00256 };

00258 void SGP_readSpectrum(  char*   fileName,
00259                                                 long*   nLines,
00260                                                 // return:
00261                                                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00262                                                 long*   particle_no,
00263                                                 float*  fluence_cm2,
00264                                                 long*   slab_no){
00265         long    i = 0;
00266 
00267         FILE*   inputFile;
00268         inputFile       =       fopen(  fileName, "r");
00269 
00270         if (inputFile == 0) return;
00271 
00272     char line[256];
00273 
00274         for (i = 0; i < *nLines; i++){
00275                 if(fgets(line, 256, inputFile) != NULL){
00276                         // isolate energy, particle no., fluence, slab no.
00277                         char    seps[]  = ",;\t";                                                                       // delimiters can be ",", ";", or tab
00278                         char*   token;
00279 
00280                         token = strtok( line, seps );
00281                         E_MeV_u[i]              =       (float)atof(token);
00282 
00283                         token = strtok( NULL, seps );
00284                         particle_no[i]  =       atol(token);
00285 
00286                         token = strtok( NULL, seps );
00287                         fluence_cm2[i]  =       (float)atof(token);                                             // if < 0 --> D.set.Gy
00288 
00289                         token = strtok( NULL, seps );
00290                         slab_no[i]              =       atol(token);
00291                 }
00292         }
00293 }
